description: Test prompts and expected results for RAG system validation

tests.name: ISO 27001 Key Rotation Requirements
tests.prompt: What does ISO 27001 require for key rotation?
tests.expectedContent: Organizations must identify, assess, and remediate technical vulnerabilities promptly, with a documented patch management and change control process for critical systems.
tests.description: Should retrieve ISO 27001 clause A.12.6.1 about technical vulnerability and patch management

tests.name: EU AI Act High-Risk Systems
tests.prompt: Which AI systems are high-risk under EU rules?
tests.expectedContent: The EU AI Act classifies certain AI systems as high-risk (e.g., safety-critical, HR, law enforcement); these require stricter governance, conformity assessments, and documentation.
tests.description: Should retrieve EU AI Act definition of high-risk AI systems

tests.name: SOC2 Change Management Controls
tests.prompt: What are the SOC2 requirements for change management?
tests.expectedContent: Change management must ensure authorized, tested, and documented changes with rollback plans and segregation of duties to prevent unauthorized production changes.
tests.description: Should retrieve SOC2 CC6.1 about change management controls
